directions: Blend plantains, spinach, bread crumbs, cornmeal, mushrooms, olives, garlic, paprika, and oregano in a food processor until a moldable batter forms; mold into patties.
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat; pan-fry patties until golden brown, 6 to 8 minutes per side. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Plantain Veggie Burgers
